Home

Welcome to My 11ty Site!

This is a simple static site built with Eleventy.

About This Site

This site is configured with a base path of /11ty-test/ which is useful for deploying to GitHub Pages or other subdirectory deployments.

Features

  • Fast static site generation
  • Nunjucks templating
  • CSS assets with passthrough copy
  • Base path configuration for subdirectory deployments
